title: Cant update, checked my internet as suggested. Tried reinstalling what do i do?
body:
Someone please help me. I really want to play leauge again :( 
I have never had this problem before, I was told to go make sure my internet wasnt blocking anything.

replies.body: There was a live service incident with the patching platform around the time you posted this that has since been resolved. If you're still experiencing patching issues, please let me know what percentage during patching that it fails at.
